title: How to resurrect Pixel 3 after error "Your device is corrupt..."
content:
Two weeks past since I updated my Pixel 3 to 11 Android. Suddenly, I received an error "Your device is corrupt. It can't be trusted and may not work properly." I pressed power button to continue and that's it, device can't be turned ON at all. No safe mode, nothing.
Want to highlight that no changes to operating system was done. I didn't even try to do.
How can I resolve the issue? Is it possible to do reset without turning pixel on?

Picture attached for visibility.
